
`lua test.bigint.lua`

```lua

+ 
= 
estimate: between 10^539 and 10^540
```

Another similar project
=======================

# in lua

 * bignum : https://github.com/shabunc/sheuler/blob/master/modules/bignum.lua ; forked [here](https://github.com/tst2005/bignum-from-shabunc-sheuler-2011) (base=?)
 * bitint : https://github.com/empyreuma/bigint.lua/ ; forked [here](https://github.com/tst2005/bigint-from-empyreuma) (base=10)
 * BigNum,BigRat (in lua): http://oss.digirati.com.br/luabignum/ ; forked [here](https://github.com/tst2005/bignum-from-digirati-2004) (base=?)

# in C

 * lua module (in C) https://github.com/JorjBauer/lua-bigint
